description: The "TSR cancel" is leaked to the adversary
The adversary tampers with the "TSR cancel". Although it will not pass the validity verification, the verification result is also tampered into "successful" to deceive CTC
The adversary counterfeits the "TSR cancel" by other command, leads to CTC providing wrong "CA0"
The "execution reminder" is leaked to the adversary
The adversary drops the "execution reminder", leads to TSRS not providing "CA1"

hazard_case: Providing a potentially safe control action but too early, too late, or in the wrong order
description: TSRS is overloaded while sending "execution reminder", leads to TSRS providing "CA1" too late

hazard_case: Providing a potentially safe control action but too early, too late, or in the wrong order
description: Communication delay happens while TSRS sending "execution reminder", leads to TSRS providing "CA1" too late
The "TSR execution" is leaked to the adversary
The adversary drops the "TSR execution", leads to CTC not providing "CA2"
The adversary counterfeits the "TSR execution" by other command, leads to CTC providing wrong "CA2"

hazard_case: Providing a potentially safe control action but too early, too late, or in the wrong order
description: CTC is overloaded while sending "TSR execution", leads to CTC providing "CA2" too late

hazard_case: Providing a potentially safe control action but too early, too late, or in the wrong order
description: Communication delay happens while CTC sending "TSR execution", leads to CTC providing "CA2" too late
The "TSR execution(RBC)" is leaked to the adversary
The adversary tampers with the "TSR execution" related contents. Although it will not pass the validity verification, the verification result is also tampered into "successful" to deceive TSRS
The adversary counterfeits the "TSR execution(RBC)" by other command, leads to the TSRS providing wrong "CA3"
The "TSR command" is leaked to the adversary
The adversary drops the "TSR command", leads to RBC not providing "CA4"
The adversary counterfeits the "TSR command" by other command, leads to RBC providing wrong "CA4"
The adversary tampers the "TSR command", leads to the CTC providing wrong "CA4"
